title: Garth Brooks' Daughter's Singing Is Amazing | Tige and Daniel | 92.5 WPAP
text:
Garth Brooks' Daughter's Singing Is Amazing posted by Tige and Daniel - 2 hours ago 
Garth Brooks has a daughter named Allie and we feel like we'll be hearing a lot from her. She's in Nashville and posted this video covering "She's Every Woman". Check it out! {"position1":{"name":"Garth Brooks","id":628013,"url":"https:\/\/www.iheart.com\/artist\/garth-brooks-628013","type":"artist","errors":null,"tagged":true}} The Tige and Daniel show is a CRS award winning and CMA nominated radio show broadcast to markets throughout the United States and on iHeartRadio. They met at Auburn University during which time Tige interned at “Late Show with David Letterman” and Daniel at MTV. Tige is married to Brittany and has one son, Mac. Daniel is single and has a dog named Fenton. Sorry they’re not more attractive. Contact
